refnamediv.refpurpose: wrapper to run openbox for LXDE

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the openbox-lxde command.
openbox-lxde is a wrapper script which runs openbox with LXDE specific config file.
